details:
Multiple out-of-bounds error were discovered in qt4-x11.
The highest threat from [CVE-2021-3481](https://security-tracker.debian.org/tracker/CVE-2021-3481) (at least) is to data
confidentiality the application availability.


For Debian 9 stretch, these problems have been fixed in version
4:4.8.7+dfsg-11+deb9u3.


We recommend that you upgrade your qt4-x11 packages.


For the detailed security status of qt4-x11 please refer to
its security tracker page at:
<https://security-tracker.debian.org/tracker/qt4-x11>


Further information about Debian LTS security advisories, how to apply
these updates to your system and frequently asked questions can be
found at: <https://wiki.debian.org/LTS>
